hero.title: Disposable Email Address
hero.description: Generate temporary email addresses instantly. Perfect for testing, sign-ups, and protecting your privacy.

emailGenerator.howItWorksDesc: Emails are automatically checked every {{interval}} seconds. Links in messages are validated automatically by our backend service.

inbox.title: Inbox
inbox.emptyDesc: Messages will appear here automatically when received

validation.autoVerified: Email verified automatically via REST API

instant.title: Instant Email Generation
instant.description: Create temporary email addresses in seconds. No registration required. Perfect for quick sign-ups and testing.

autoValidation.title: Auto Link Validation
autoValidation.description: Links in emails are automatically validated. Firebase verification links are processed instantly via REST API.

realtime.title: Real-time Updates
realtime.description: Messages appear automatically with {{interval}}-second polling. No need to manually refresh. Always stay updated.

footer.copyright: Â© 2024 TempMail Pro. All rights reserved.

toast.emailCopiedDesc: Email address has been copied to clipboard.
toast.copyFailedDesc: Failed to copy email address. Please try again.
toast.clearFailedDesc: Failed to clear inbox. Please try again.
toast.messageDeletedDesc: The message has been deleted successfully.
toast.deleteFailedDesc: Failed to delete the message. Please try again.
toast.linkValidationStartedDesc: We found a validation link in your email. It's being automatically validated.
toast.linkValidationSuccessDesc: The validation link has been successfully processed ({{provider}})
toast.linkValidationFailedDesc: The validation link could not be processed. Please try manually.

help.title: Help & Shortcuts
help.subtitle: Keyboard shortcuts and touch gestures guide

playwrightTest.title: Playwright Test
playwrightTest.subtitle: Email validation verification with browser automation

history.title: History
history.subtitle: View your generated emails tree and their messages

automation.title: Account Automation
automation.subtitle: Automatically create accounts with Playwright
automation.selectProviderDesc: Choose the service to create an account
